channel.title: Help me with this topic!
channel.description: uhmm anybody know how i can add items into my shops (as in customs) please i need all the help i can get!! ;) ;) ;) ;) ;)

item.title: Help me with this topic!
item.dc:creator: @maxmurks maxmurks
item.description:
@maxmurks wrote:

Yeah the .java is just the type of file. Sorry should have mentioned that.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with this topic!
item.dc:creator: @chicken_liver chicken liver
item.description:
@chicken_liver wrote:

hey i only found shops just plain shops not shops.java does just shops work 2?[quote=“maxmurks, post:2, topic:296465”]Okay, first off there’s a lot of tuts. over this if you have tried searching, but open you source and find the Shops.java file. It’s usually in the config folder but if not just check around. Then you find the shop you want to add to. Just search for the name. After you’ve found that scroll to the far right and then tab after the last numbers in the row, if its not already, and put (Item ID)*tab* (amount in shop) then you save and compile your server.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with this topic!
item.dc:creator: @maxmurks maxmurks
item.description:
@maxmurks wrote:

Okay, first off there’s a lot of tuts. over this if you have tried searching, but open you source and find the Shops.java file. It’s usually in the config folder but if not just check around. Then you find the shop you want to add to. Just search for the name. After you’ve found that scroll to the far right and then tab after the last numbers in the row, if its not already, and put (Item ID)*tab* (amount in shop) then you save and compile your server.

Read full topic
